remarks: Deduction to prove measurability of a real function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2014.)
statement:
ismbf2d.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> RR ) $.
ismbf2d.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. dom vol ) $.
ismbf2d.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR ) -> ( `' F " ( x (,) +oo ) ) e. dom vol ) $.
ismbf2d.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR ) -> ( `' F " ( -oo (,) x ) ) e. dom vol ) $.
ismbf2d $p |- ( ph -> F e. MblFn ) $.
$d F x $.
$d ph x $.
